From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

As Rampage rolled up to near the Transmutate, he stopped, his crab head
first looked up, "Rampage, TERRORIZE." Through a backflip, Rampage
shifted into his robot mode, holding his large Gattling cannon awquardly
to a side. He looked to Mutate, and put a finger to his mouth,
"Shhhhhhhh." He whispere. "Let me indulge in the pain surrounding this
area." He turned, and held his hands up, as if grasping something, yet
nothing was there. "Yes, it's so cold, so much suffering. H AH ha ha
ha." He began to cackle insanly, holding his cannon up, and firring
missiles off randomly, his barrel shifting for a new missile to replace
the old one, as barrages headed everywhere.
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Megatron tried to push himself upright, but could not, it can't end
here, he thought to himself. "Decepticons." He said through a strained
voice, "Fin....finish the retreat."
